head.title: Paid Notice: Deaths SURDOVAL, DONALD J.

hedline.hl1: Paid Notice: Deaths SURDOVAL, DONALD J.

block.p: SURDOVAL-Donald J. Of Saddle River, NJ, on Thursday, August 10, 2000. Beloved husband of Patricia (nee Fitzpatrick). Devoted father of Lisa A. of Saddle River, NJ; Catherine A. of Nanuet, NY; Donald J. of Sparta, NJ; John G. of Sydney, Australia; and Brian G. of Hoboken, NJ. Loving grandfather of Donnie, Kaitlin, and Alison Surdoval. Funeral Mass 10 a.m. Monday at St. Gabriel's RC Church, Saddle River, NJ. Interment, Cemetery of the Ascension, Monsey, NY. Visiting 7-9 p.m. Saturday and 2-4 and 7-9 p.m. Sunday at the Robert Spearing Funeral Home, Inc., 155 Kinderkamack Road, Park Ridge, NJ. Memorial donations may be made to Calvary Hospital, 1740 East Chester Road, Bronx, NY 10461.
